author: CoinDesk
title: Bitcoin's Record-Long Summer Lull: How Should You Trade It?
description: Bitcoin has been locked in a 10% trading channel for 39 days, putting it just days away from the longest range-bound streak ever recorded. How should you...
content: Bitcoin has been locked in a 10% trading channel for 39 days, putting it just days away from the longest range-bound streak ever recorded. How should you trade the asset during this summer lull and wâ€¦ [+132 chars]
reworded_title:
Bitcoin's record-high fall is about to change. As the market continues to get hotter and more volatile, the company is trying to find a way to raise more money from investors, and that will include a change in its policies.

Bitcoin's recent price slide could be a sign of things to come. Earlier this week, Bitcoin's market cap slumped from $5.2 billion to $1.6 billion after the company's price stabilized, and it now sits at $1
reworded_description:
" The Bitcoin Network is back. A major milestone in Bitcoin history.

It's a historic moment for the Bitcoin Network. Today's Bitcoin transaction volume is 2.6 million blocks. It was only 1.6 million blocks on the day of the massive Bitcoin transaction block on 8 May 2013. The first block of 2.6 million blocks was released on 7 May 2013. The next day it was 4.4 million blocks. The next day it was 2.2 million blocks and
reworded_content:
The only thing that seems to be keeping the bubble going for the past 36 hours has been the "investors are in" (even though the investors have been talking about the future of Bitcoin).

This could be a sign of the end of a long awaited, but very exciting, period of time when investors are out of the market.
